text:
[spk_1] This is a 100 million dollar mega mansion.
这是一座价值一亿美元的超级豪宅。

[spk_1] And it's possibly the most luxurious house ever built by mankind.
这可能是人类有史以来最奢华的住宅。

[spk_1] And we're going to be comparing living in this house to living in this 69 million dollar art house
我们将比较住在这栋房子里和住在这座价值六千九百万美元的艺术豪宅中的体验

[spk_1] that's built to withstand a literal tsunami.
这座房子是专门设计来抵御真正海啸的。

[spk_1] A 30 million dollar palace with its very own water park.
一座价值三千万美元的宫殿，还自带水上乐园。

[spk_1] and everything in between.
以及中间的一切。

[spk_1] All the way down to this 1 barely functioning house.
一路降到这栋几乎无法居住的房子。

[spk_1] More of a shed.
更像个小棚子。

[spk_1] Well, it's only a dollar.
好吧，才一美元。

[spk_1] Why does this house cost a dollar?
这房子为什么只卖一美元？

[spk_2] we get another storm.
又要来一场风暴了。

[spk_2] It's probably going to go into the water.
它可能会落入水中。

[spk_2] So it's worth a dollar for me to just to get rid of it.
所以为了把它处理掉，我愿意花一美元。

[spk_2] So,
所以，

[spk_1] So you would say this is a horrible investment for me.
所以你会说，这对我来说是个糟糕的投资。

[spk_1] Yes, indeed. Let's do it.
没错，就是这样。我们干吧。

[spk_1] Oh, oh, this is sketchy.
哦，哦，这太可疑了。

[spk_1] What are the odds I fall through?
我掉下去的概率有多大？

[spk_1] Pretty high. Bro, these are wobbly.
概率很高啊，老兄，这地板晃得厉害。

[spk_1] I like how that chair is just like holding on for real life.
我喜欢这把椅子仿佛紧紧抓住现实生活的样子。

[spk_1] We have a recliner, a mattress, and half a floor.
我们有一张躺椅、一张床垫，还有一半的地板。

[spk_2] I can literally fish from inside of the house.
我简直能在屋里钓鱼了。

[spk_2] Yo, I caught one. Whoa.
嘿，我钓到一条了！哇哦。

[spk_2] That's just the lure.
这只不过是假饵而已。

[spk_2] I'm sorry. Oh.
对不起，哦。

[spk_1] Now that you see us having fun, do you regret selling it?
现在你看到我们玩得这么开心，后悔卖掉它了吗？

[spk_1] I do not.
我不后悔。

[spk_1] What if I gave you 2 to buy it back off me?
如果我给你两美元，让你从我这儿买回去呢？

[spk_1] No. All right.
不，好吧。

[spk_2] I tried. I have an idea.
我试过了，我有个主意。

[spk_2] Let's get out of this house.
我们离开这房子吧。

[spk_1] Later in this video, we have a house that costs 100 million times more than this.
在这段视频的后面，我们会展示一栋房子，它的价格是这栋的1亿倍。

[spk_1] And because I never plan on setting foot in this worthless shack again...
而且，我根本不会再踏进这栋毫无价值的小破屋一步...

[spk_1] Let's head over to something a little nicer.
我们去个好点的地方吧。

[spk_1] Speaking of which, we're at the million dollar house.
说到这个，我们到了这栋百万美元的房子。

[spk_1] Which technically means you need to be a millionaire to buy this house.
严格来说，买这栋房子你得是百万富翁。

[spk_1] Let's show you how a millionaire lives.
让我们看看百万富翁是怎么生活的。

[spk_1] My first impression is it's way bigger than my house.
我第一感觉是，这房子比我家大太多了。

[spk_1] When you pay a million dollars, you get a pretty good sized kitchen,
当你花一百万美元买房时，能得到一个相当大的厨房，

[spk_1] along with four bedrooms that look normal.
还有四间看起来很普通的卧室。

[spk_1] But they keep going because this bedroom has a closet here,
但他们继续前进，因为这个卧室里有一个衣橱

[spk_1] which leads into a bathroom that is bigger than the one dollar house.
通向一间比一美元房子还大的浴室。

[spk_1] This bathroom is huge.
这个浴室太大了。

[spk_2] bathtub is gigantic. I'm six foot five and I could fit in this perfectly comfortable.
浴缸大得离谱。我身高六英尺五，躺进去都绰绰有余。

[spk_1] And even though the bathrooms are all stocked with bidets,
尽管所有浴室都配备了净身盆，

[spk_1] Oh my god! AHHHH!
天哪！啊啊啊！

[spk_1] the best seat in the house is definitely downstairs.
房子里最好的座位，绝对是楼下的。

[spk_1] Oh snap! They have a movie theater!
天哪！他们居然有个电影院！

[spk_1] Dude,
兄弟

[spk_2] These chairs are massage chairs.
这些椅子是按摩椅。

[spk_0] What? These chairs eat-
什么？这些椅子会吃—

[spk_2] We each have two remotes.
我们每人有两个遥控器。

[spk_1] On top of the movie theater, there's also an arcade.
在电影院顶部，还有一个街机厅。

[spk_1] I was not expecting all these features for 1 million.
我没想到花一百万美元还能有这么多功能。

[spk_2] Awesome
太棒了

[spk_1] I'd have so much more friends if I owned a place like this.
如果我有这样一个地方，朋友肯定多得多。

[spk_1] And ending with the pool.
最后以泳池收尾。

[spk_1] Which comes complete with this unnecessary waterfall.
还配有一个多余的瀑布。

[spk_1] Overall, I'd say this was a pretty fun house to live in.
总的来说，我觉得住在这栋房子里还挺有趣的。

[spk_1] But of course, we're all here to see the richest of the rich.
但当然，我们所有人在这里，都是为了看看最富有的人。

[spk_1] And that's why up next we have the 15-
因此，接下来我们要看的是价值一亿——

[spk_1] 15 million house.
1500万美元的房子。

[spk_1] Oh, you push it?
哦，你推动它了？

[spk_1] Oh, my gosh. Jeez, man.
天哪，我的天啊，老兄。

[spk_0] Ew!
呃！

[spk_1] I don't belong here.
我不属于这里。

[spk_2] This looks like the house that you tried to get to in GTA.
这看起来就是你在《GTA》里想逃到的那栋房子。

[spk_1] That view is crazy.
这景色太疯狂了。

[spk_1] The pool is much smaller than the 1 million house,
这个泳池比那栋一百万美元的房子小多了，

[spk_1] but you can literally oversee all of LA.
但你几乎能俯瞰整个洛杉矶。

[spk_0] HELP! HEY!
救命！嘿！

[spk_1] Stop, stop, go inside.
停下，停下，快进去。

[spk_1] I need new friends.
我需要新朋友。

[spk_1] Let's check out the house.
咱们去看看房子吧。

[spk_1] The person who owns this house,
这所房子的主人是

[spk_1] what do you think he does for a living?
你觉得他靠什么谋生？

[spk_2] NFT is
NFT是

[spk_1] He's a lawyer. This guy was the top attorney in 2017 and the number one lawyer in 2021.
他是个律师，2017年是顶尖律师，2021年更是排名第一的律师。

[spk_1] Apparently that's all it takes to afford this house. It appears a note was left for us.
看来这就是买下这栋房子的全部条件了。似乎有人给我们留了张便条。

[spk_1] Dear Mr. Beast, thank you for visiting my home. You have given me the ultimate gift.
亲爱的Mr. Beast，感谢您光临我的家。您送给了我最珍贵的礼物。

[spk_1] I have a trump card with my kids forever.
我从此以后有了一个能永远打动孩子们的杀手锏。

[spk_2] Also, please don't eat any of the sandwiches. They are very sacred to me and my family's been passing it down from generation to generation
还有，请别吃任何三明治，它们对我和我的家人来说无比神圣，这个配方已经代代相传了。

[spk_1] Got it. Down or up? Down.
明白了。要下还是上？下。

[spk_1] Down it is.
那就选下面了。

[spk_1] Okay, now it's starting to look nice.
好了，现在看起来终于有点样子了。

[spk_1] The lower floor of this mansion comes with its very own movie theater and personal gym.
这栋豪宅的底层配有专属电影院和私人健身房。

[spk_1] This treadmill requires the passcode to use.
使用这台跑步机需要输入密码。

[spk_2] It's not 6969.
不是6969。

[spk_1] bedroom, entertainment area, and a bar where the owner left us a bunch of free food.
卧室、娱乐区，还有一个酒吧，主人给我们留了一大堆免费食物。

[spk_1] Guys, before you eat anything, what if he left this out so he could sue us for eating his food?
伙计们，你们吃之前有没有想过，他故意把食物放在这儿，就是想告我们偷吃？

[spk_1] Welp, too late now, Carlated.
唉，现在太晚了，卡尔ated。

[spk_1] And an incredible underground view of the swimming pool.
还能看到游泳池令人惊叹的地下景观。

[spk_0] Geeily YAAAAAAAAA WOO
天啊！耶——啊——哇！

[spk_1] Nolan's trying to swim in the background for the shot.
诺兰正在背景里试着游泳，为了拍这个镜头。

[spk_1] I don't think he realized we stopped filming him.
我觉得他没意识到我们已经停止拍摄他了。

[spk_0] Back here?
回到这儿？

[spk_1] And now, a master bedroom with another crazy view.
现在来看主卧，还有另一处疯狂的景观。

[spk_1] Carl, come here. You missed.
卡尔，过来一下，你错过了。

[spk_1] We got another one.
我们又找到一个。

[spk_1] Why did you miss again?
你又为什么没接到？

[spk_1] Oh, wait. No, stop it. No.
哦，等等，别闹了，别这样。

[spk_0] Stop this cushion also!
别碰这个靠垫！

[spk_0] Stop throwing this cushion!
别再扔这个靠垫了！

[spk_1] If it goes over the edge, he might sue me!
如果它掉下去，他可能会起诉我！

[spk_1] And so, to avoid being handed court papers,
所以，为了避免收到法院传票，

[spk_1] we decided to fly all the way across the country to Massachusetts
所以我们决定横跨整个国家，飞到马萨诸塞州

[spk_1] for the 30 million house!
为了那栋3000万美元的房子！

[spk_1] This extraordinary 16 bedroom estate has four different buildings
这座非凡的16卧室庄园包含四座独立建筑

[spk_1] In the main house, there are multiple living rooms.
在主屋里，有多个客厅。

[spk_1] But this one is the best of the living rooms in this property.
但这个客厅是这处房产里最棒的。

[spk_1] This is grand. What is this?
这太宏伟了！这是什么？

[spk_1] The Oval Office.
椭圆形办公室。

[spk_1] What book would you expect here besides The Way to Wealth by Benjamin Franklin?
除了本杰明·富兰克林的《致富之路》，你还期待这里有什么书？

[spk_1] Grooming the Lightbulb.
给灯泡做美容

[spk_2] and a book?
还有一本书？

[spk_1] Well, Edison made the light bulb, not Ben Franklin.
嗯，爱迪生发明了灯泡，不是本·富兰克林。

[spk_1] Ben Franklin?
本·富兰克林？

[spk_1] I'm gonna read this book.
我要读这本书。

[spk_1] Past the living room and the office was the grand kitchen, where the owner had left a little gift for us.
穿过客厅和办公室，就是宽敞的厨房，主人给我们留了一份小礼物。

[spk_1] The owner of this place got rich making candles, so he made us custom Mr. Beast candles.
这房子的主人靠做蜡烛发了财，所以他给我们定制了专属的MrBeast蜡烛。

[spk_1] That one smells like the beach.
这个闻起来像海边。

[spk_1] It does. How do they put the beach in a candle?
确实。他们是怎么把海滩的味道放进蜡烛里的？

[spk_1] And to top off the house's main building, Chandler discovered that...
为了完成这栋房子的主建筑，钱德勒发现……

[spk_1] She can hit golf balls off the roof.
她可以从屋顶上打高尔夫球。

[spk_1] Or...
或者...

[spk_1] But that's not even close to the coolest thing about this place.
但这还不是这个地方最酷的地方。

[spk_1] Because next door is a garage filled with exotic cars.
因为隔壁是个停满跑车的车库。

[spk_1] This looks like a garage out of a video game.
这看起来像是电子游戏里的车库。

[spk_1] They got Lamborghinis on top of Lamborghinis.
他们把兰博基尼摞在了兰博基尼上面。

[spk_1] It's like a candy store for adults.
这就像给成年人开的糖果店。

[spk_1] And the best part is, this is just one of two car garages.
最棒的是，这仅仅是两个车库里的一间。

[spk_1] Follow me. There's more?
跟我来，还有更多？

[spk_1] Bro, there's more cars in here than the other one.
老兄，这儿的车比上一个地方还多。

[spk_1] All right, now I am convinced if we steal a car,
好吧，现在我信了，如果我们偷一辆车，

[spk_1] he would not notice.
他根本不会发现。

[spk_1] How do you even buy these cars?
你到底是怎么买到这些车的？

[spk_1] Hey, I want three of the same ones.
嘿，我要三辆一样的。

[spk_1] It's like a full-time job to buy this many cars.
买这么多车简直像份全职工作。

[spk_1] There's stairs in the corner.
角落里有楼梯。

[spk_1] Let's see where they go.
我们去看看它们通向哪里。

[spk_1] Bro, this is like a closet with cars.
老兄，这简直就像个停满车的储物间。

[spk_1] Underneath the car garage is another army of cars.
车库里下面，还藏着另一支车队。

[spk_1] They should really invest in a light switch down here.
他们真该在这儿装个电灯开关。

[spk_1] They have 20 cars down here, but no lights.
这儿有二十辆车，却连灯都没有。

[spk_0] No way. No way! No!
不可能！不可能！绝不！

[spk_1] That's why there wasn't a light switch!
所以那里才没有电灯开关！

[spk_1] I was like, who can afford to shove 30 cars in their basement but not electricity?
我当时就想，谁能负担得起把30辆车塞进地下室，却付不起电费？

[spk_1] Now don't get me wrong, all the rooms in this house have been awesome so far.
不过别误会，这房子里的每个房间到目前为止都太棒了。

[spk_1] But if I owned it, I don't think I would ever leave this next building.
但如果这房子归我，我觉得我永远不会离开下一栋楼。

[spk_1] This is awesome!
这太棒了！

[spk_1] That's right, for some just ungodly reason,
没错，不知为啥，就是有这种离谱的原因，

[spk_1] whoever built this place thought it would be a good idea to install an entire indoor tennis court.
不知为什么，建造这个地方的人竟觉得装一个室内网球场是个好主意。

[spk_1] I just want to remind you that we are playing tennis inside a house.
我只是想提醒你，我们正在房子里打网球。

[spk_1] I also have no idea how to play tennis.
我根本不知道怎么打网球。

[spk_1] Gang squad, follow me. What?
特警队，跟我来？什么？

[spk_1] No way.
不可能。

[spk_2] Two-story arcade.
两层楼的街机厅。

[spk_1] The arcade in this house is actually 20 times bigger than the one in the one million dollar house.
这房子里的街机游戏厅，实际上比那栋百万美元房子的要大二十倍。

[spk_1] Whoa. But that's not all.
哇，但这还只是开始。

[spk_1] Whoa, this place literally has everything.
哇，这地方真的应有尽有。

[spk_1] All right.
好吧。

[spk_2] I'm never leaving.
我绝对不会走。

[spk_2] We're playing ping pong in a basketball court in a house.
我们正在房子里的篮球场上打乒乓球。

[spk_1] First try, baby.
[spk_1] First try, baby.

[spk_1] All the features of the 30 million house have been pretty cool.
[spk_1] All the features of the 30 million house have been pretty cool.

[spk_1] But this next room is what makes this place truly special.
[spk_1] But this next room is what makes this place truly special.

[spk_1] Head up these stairs for the best part of the estate.
[spk_1] Head up these stairs for the best part of the estate.

[spk_1] What you really want to see is right over here.
你真正想看的就在那边。

[spk_1] Look at this.
看这个。

[spk_1] This is an indoor water park.
这是一个室内水上乐园。

[spk_0] Whoa.
哇哦。

[spk_0] It's like a whole nother world in here.
这里面简直像另一个世界。

[spk_1] Look how far back the drone is and it's still going!
看无人机飞得这么远，还在继续！

[spk_1] Go have fun, but don't break anything!
去玩吧，但别弄坏任何东西！

[spk_1] Roger that.
收到。

[spk_0] Ha ha ha ha!
哈哈哈！

[spk_0] We're all about to go down the slide together!
我们都要一起滑下滑梯了！

[spk_1] We're gonna enjoy the water park.
我们要去玩水上乐园了。

[spk_1] I'll see you at the next house.
我在下一套房子等你。

[spk_1] The only bad news is it's across the entire country.
唯一坏消息是，它遍布全国。

[spk_1] The good news is...
好消息是...

[spk_1] It's a 45 million Mega Man ship.
好消息是，这是一艘价值四千五百万的铁甲战士飞船。

[spk_1] Whoa. What? Oh my gosh.
哇？什么？天啊。

[spk_2] It's like the most open house I've ever been in.
这简直是我见过最开放的房子里了。

[spk_2] What?
什么？

[spk_1] I don't know what majestic thing this is, but it's beautiful.
我不知道这到底是什么宏伟的东西，但它真美。

[spk_1] As you can probably tell, these houses are starting to get so expensive,
正如你可能已经注意到的，这些房子的价格正在变得越来越高

[spk_1] I don't even know how to describe them anymore.
我都想不出该怎么形容它们了。

[spk_1] Honestly, lost for words.
说实话，我都不知道该怎么说了。

[spk_1] This is quite possibly the most beautiful thing I've ever seen.
这可能是我见过的最美丽的东西。

[spk_1] So I called in multi-billionaire Mark Cuban to help us out.
于是我请来了亿万富翁马克·库班来帮我们。

[spk_1] How's it going?
最近怎么样？

[spk_1] Hey, good to see you.
嘿，见到你真好。

[spk_1] How's it going, little man?
最近怎么样啊，小家伙？

[spk_1] Nice to meet you.
很高兴认识你。

[spk_1] Mark's also the proud owner of the Dallas Mavericks basketball team.
马克还是达拉斯小牛队篮球队的骄傲拥有者。

[spk_1] And because this house has its very own basketball court,
而且这所房子还配有专属的篮球场，

[spk_1] you can imagine we got a little distracted.
你可以想象，我们有点分心了。

[spk_1] Ah, Jimmy won't make it.
啊，吉米赶不上了。

[spk_1] Buckets.
桶。

[spk_1] All right, just steal it from Carl.
好吧，那就从卡尔那儿偷来吧。

[spk_1] Hit that. No shot.
就是它了。没机会了。

[spk_1] We get those.
我们有这些。

[spk_3] Yeah, go go go go go easy layup, bud. Yeah
对，轻点上篮，伙计。对

[spk_0] Yeah!
对！

[spk_1] There we go. Next one wins.
就是这样，下一个赢的。

[spk_1] Oh, you did it. Game winner.
哦，你做到了！赢了比赛。

[spk_0] Oh no! Yeah!
天哪！是啊！

[spk_3] Way to dominate, Jakers.
干得漂亮，杰克尔斯！

[spk_1] Now we're going to show Mark around the rest of the house,
现在我们带马克参观一下房子的其他部分

[spk_1] now that we're all sweaty.
毕竟我们都出汗了。

[spk_1] To find out if he thought it was worth the steep 45 million price tag.
